DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate immune response reactogenicity H5N1 vaccination subject age 6 month 17 year compare seasonal flu vaccination
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity , Safety Tolerability Two Doses Pre-pandemic Influenza Vaccine Participants Aged 6 Months 17 Years
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Receipt Seasonal Influenza Vaccine season 2007/2008 Receipt another vaccine within 3 week vaccination Previous vaccination pandemic candidate vaccine and/or vaccine contain adjuvant MF59 similar adjuvant Children local recommendation influenza vaccination due underlying disease
